Translations.Text: vitiyarkalaiyin mitum, cattiyamaka! Pattu iravukalin mitum, cattiyamaka
vitiyarkalaiyin mitum, cattiyamaka! Pattu iravukalin mitum, cattiyamaka
orrai irattai(t tolukai)yin mitum, cattiyamaka
Nikalkinra iravin mitu cattiyamaka! (Kelvi kanakku ketkum nal vante tirum)
itil arivutaiyavarkalukku (nampikkaiyalikkakkutiya) periyatoru cattiyam irukkiratu
(napiye! Uyarnta) tunkalaipponra iram ennum atu makkalai umatu iraivan eppati (vetanai) ceytan enpatai nir kavanikkavillaiya
(napiye! Uyarnta) tunkalaipponra iram ennum atu makkalai umatu iraivan eppati (vetanai) ceytan enpatai nir kavanikkavillaiya
avarkalaip ponru, (palacalikal ulakattilulla) nakarankalil (enkume) pataikkappatavillai
innum, samut ennum makkalai (umatu iraivan evvaru vetanai ceytan enpatai nir kavanikkavillaiya?) Ivarkal pallattakkil malaikalaik kutaintu, (atil vacittuk) kontiruntarkal
innum, (iranuvankalaiyutaiya) anikkara hpir'avnai (umatu iraivan evvaru vetanai ceytan enpatai nir kavanikka villaiya)
ivarkalellam pumiyil varampu miriye natantarkal
(pumiyil) avarkal mikka atikamakave visamam ceytu kontiruntanar
atalal, unkal iraivan avarkal mitu vetanaiyin cattaiyaikkontu (ati mel ati) atittan
niccayamaka umatu iraivan (intap pavikalin varavai) etirpartta vannamaka irukkiran
akave, iraivan manitanaic cotittu avanukku arulpurintu avanai menmaiyakkinal, en iraivan ennaik kanniyappatuttinan enru (perumaiyakak) kurukiran
ayinum, (iraivan) avanaic cotittu avanutaiya porulai avanukkuk kuraittuvittal, enatu iraivan ennai ilivupatutti vittan enru (kurai) kurukiran
(visayam) avvaralla. Ninkal anataikalaik kanniyappatuttuvatillai
elaikalukku unavu(m valvataramum ninkal alikkatatutan marra evaraiyum) alikkumpati tuntuvatillai
Pirarutaiya cottukkalai unkal cottutan certtu pucittuvitukirirkal
mikka alavu katantu porulai necikkirirkal
avvaralla! Pumi tul tulakat takarkkappatum camayattil
umatu iraivanum varuvan. Vanavarkalum ani'aniyaka varuvarkal
annalil (pavikalukkaka) narakam kontuvarappatum. Annalil manitanukku nallarivu utayamakum. Eninum, appotu (utayamakinra) arival avanukku enna payan
‘‘en valkkaiyil nan (oru) nanmaiyaic ceytu vaittirukka ventume!'' Enru pulampuvan
annalil (pavikalai) avan ceyyum vetanaiyaip pol marrevanum (evaraiyum) ceyyamattan. (Avvalavu katinamaka avan vetanai ceyvan)
(pavikalai) avan kattuvataippol palamaka marra evanume kattamattan. (Avvalavu palamaka avan kattuvan)
(eninum, annalil nalla manitanai nokki) “nim'matiperra atmave
ni (iraivanaik kontu) tiruptiyataintataka! (Iraivanal ni) tirupti kollappattataka un iraivan pakkam tirumpac cel!'' (Enrum)
‘‘ni en nallatiyarkalil cerntu
en corkkattilum ni nulaintuvitu'' (enrum kuruvan)
